<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout's Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2048) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 188 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2047)

</column>

---

You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning. Choose one enemy. Stride, [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) against that opponent, and then make a Strike against that foe. For your Feint, you can attempt a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check instead of the [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check that's usually required, because you use the terrain around you to catch your foe off-guard.
name: Scout's Charge
